name: You've Got To Be Shifting Me
name_original: You've Got To Be Shifting Me
description:
For Wowie game jam. This project was created by 3 people in the span of 72 hours. 

Theme: Failure is progress

In our game, when a character dies they turn into a platform. This can be used to stop projectiles or get across a gap. 

Programmers:  Colby Bradley,  Nick Doucette

Level Design: Matt Boucher
